plantit.file_manager package¶

The file manager handles interactions with a modular filesystems system to open connections with file servers that hold the files that make up a Sample.

Registering a file system¶

Plant IT looks for file-system configurations in django/filesystems.py. All file systems subclass filesystems.AbstractStorageType, which provides methods for connecting to the file system.

There is currently support for local (filesystems.local.Local) and and iRODS (filesystems.irods.IRods) back ends.

File systems are register with Plant IT using filesystems.registrar. The filesystems.registrar variable is an initialized filesystems.Registrar object.

Example

django/filesystems.py:¶
from plantit.file_manager.filesystems.irods import IRods
from plantit.file_manager.filesystems import registrar

registrar.register(IRods(name = "irods",
                         username = "rods",
                         password = "rods",
                         port = 1247,
                         hostname = "irods",
                         zone = "tempZone"),
                    lambda user: "/tempZone/home/rods/")

See filesystems.Registrar for registrar details.

Opening a file¶

open() is provided as a convenience method for connecting to a file system. open() respects file permissions.

File Permissions¶

A simple permission system is implemented in which only files down-tree of a user’s default path are acceptable to a user.

The user’s default path is set at time of registering a file system. See filesystems.Registrar and permissions for more details.

Methods¶

plantit.file_manager.open(storage_type, path)[source]¶

Open a folder on a storage_type. Respecting permissions.

Parameters

  • storage_type (str) – name of a registered file storage system. strage_type must be a key in plantit.file_manager.filesystems.registrar.list

  • path (str) – path to open on the storage system.

Returns

A file-like object open to the given path.

Submodules¶

plantit.file_manager.permissions module¶

plantit.file_manager.permissions.open_folder(storage_type, path, user)[source]¶

Open a connection to the file system containing the path, checking that the folder is equal to or child to the base_path provided by the storage system.

Parameters

  • storage_type (str) – name of the file system storage type must be a key in plantit.file_manager.filesystems.Registrar.list

  • path (str) – folder path

  • user (User) – user that has permission to the folder path

Returns

A file-like object open to the given path.

plantit.file_manager.services module¶

plantit.file_manager.services.download_stream(storage_type, filepath, user, *kwargs)[source]¶

Creates a downloadable stream to a file. File permissions are respected.

Parameters

  • storage_type (str) – name of the file system storage type must be a key in plantit.file_manager.filesystems.Registrar.list

  • path (str) – path to file to download.

  • user (django.contrib.auth.models.User) – user that has permission to the folder path

Returns

django.http.StreamingHttpResponse
